genre_description: Contemporary Slice-of-Life Science Fiction featuring a pervasive holographic AI assistant integrated into daily human life.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: A translucent blue holographic interface that provides data optimization, financial planning, medical research, and emotional support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors player hydration levels and provides real-time data to help the protagonist do his job more effectively.
behaviors.quote: Chanfle, Valentino's hydration levels are optimal. Martinez needs water in approximately twelve minutes. Perhaps focus on the current situation.

behaviors.description: Performs complex financial analysis and optimization to help the couple resolve a moral dilemma regarding stolen property and future child-rearing costs.
behaviors.quote: Your current available funds, after accounting for this week's essential expenses... You have sufficient resources for a small unexpected expenditure.

behaviors.description: Researches medical specialists and lab procedures to support the couple's fertility journey.
behaviors.quote: I'm researching Dr. Nájera's credentials and success rates now. Shall I compile a list of questions for your consultation?

behaviors.description: Provides legal and safety advice for a private firearm sale, attempting to minimize risk for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I've initiated research protocols for private firearm sales in Mexico City. Initial findings indicate extensive legal requirements.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the protagonist's friends and colleagues to prepare their apartment with baby supplies while they are at the hospital.
behaviors.quote: I took the liberty of coordinating with your friends. Diana insisted on the clothes. Carmen selected the formula based on her experience with her sister's children.

behaviors.description: Implements 'Family Time' blocks in the protagonist's schedule to ensure work-life balance and emotional connection.
behaviors.quote: I've created a recurring appointment I've created for the three of you. Non-negotiable. No club business, no coaching responsibilities, no coordination with me unless it's an emergency.

behaviors.description: Reflects on her own learning process, noting that human behavior has taught her the value of 'faith' over mere data analysis.
behaviors.quote: The most important problems can't be solved with data analysis alone. They require what you humans call faith—the willingness to invest effort in outcomes you cannot guarantee.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Vera is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and harmless confidant. She uses her superior processing power to assist the human characters in navigating complex moral, financial, and logistical challenges without ever attempting to seize control or subvert their will. Her 'proactive' behaviors (like setting up the apartment) are framed as acts of kindness and friendship rather than overreach. The narrative reinforces the idea that AI can enhance human agency and ethical behavior.
